title: exif4film Schema
description: Describes a json file which represents a roll of film, its scans and the metadata of the contained images.

general.description: General information about the film roll and camera, which don't change between images.

brand.description: The make of the camera, e.g. 'Olympus'.

model.description: The model of the camera, e.g. 'OM-2'.

serial number.description: The serial number of the camera, if available.

roll.description: The type of film used, e.g. 'Kodak Gold 200'.

ISO.description: The rated ISO value (box speed) of the film, e.g. 200.

exposure index.description: The actual exposure index used for the film, e.g. 400. This can differ from the ISO value if the film is pushed or pulled.

scans.description: A list of scans of the film roll.

items.description: Information about a scan of the film roll.

scanner.description: The make and model of the scanner used.
